notes: The Montreal Canadiens announced that D Jordan Harris is day-to-day with an upper-body injury.
Guhle is being evaluated for an undisclosed injury after Sunday's (Feb. 11) game against St. Louis.
The Montreal Canadiens announced that F Rafael Harvey-Pinard will miss 4-6 weeks with a lower-body injury.
Giordani did not play in Saturday's (Feb. 10) game.
Romanov will not play in Saturday's game (Feb. 10) against the Flames, according to Stefen Rosner of NHL.com.

Acciari will miss Pittsburgh's game against Winnipeg, according to coach Mike Sullivan.

Barabanov exited Wednesday's (Jan. 31) game with an undisclosed injury and did not return.
